text: I'm proud to be an original cosponsor of @RepKManning's resolution introduced today, expressing support for contraceptive rights and access and I join my colleagues in calling for Title X funding to help ensure access to this care for individuals and families across the country.

This program goes a long way to support Black, Indigenous, and other people of color; LGBTQ people; and those living in rural areas who have historically had a harder time accessing reproductive health care.

Title X - the only federal grant program of its kind - provides funding for contraception, STI and HIV services, cancer screening, options counseling, and other critical services for low-income individuals and families.

Today is the 57th anniversary of the Supreme Court decision in Griswold v. Connecticut, which affirmed the right to privacy regarding reproductive and family planning decisions. With these rights on the line, it is now more important than ever for Congress to fully #FundTitleX.
